attributes.action: put his money where his mouth is and  have the political courage to legislate to prevent employers from closing final salary pension schemes and thus depriving emplolyees from receiving the level of pension benefits necessary to sustain civilised lifestyles whilst the employers enjoy comparativley obscene levels of benefit and MP's protect their own benefits.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –

http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Pensions-cut/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
